summary: Test suite for the Kinesis Video service that uses Moto to mock AWS and a local server to validate stream lifecycle operations (create, delete, describe, list) and data endpoint retrieval via the Boto3 client, as well as a healthâ€‘check of the mock server.
business_intent: Ensure that applications interacting with Kinesis Video streams behave correctly in development and CI environments by providing reliable, isolated tests for stream management and service availability without requiring real AWS resources.
